tasks.title: Implement API Key Authentication
tasks.description: Set up authentication mechanism to validate API keys in request headers
tasks.details: Create middleware to extract and validate API keys from Authorization header. Store credentials securely using n8n's credential system. Implement error handling for invalid or missing keys.
tasks.testStrategy: Send requests with valid and invalid API keys to verify authentication success/failure

tasks.title: Create Operation Dropdown Field
tasks.description: Implement UI component to select operation type from available options
tasks.details: Design and implement a dropdown field in n8n node configuration to select between Sound, Speech, Transcription, Subtitle, and Video operations. Populate options based on API endpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify dropdown displays all operation categories and allows selection

tasks.title: Implement Sound Operations
tasks.description: Develop functionality for sound-related API endpoints
tasks.details: Create separate functions for GET /sounds/{sound} and POST /combine-sounds. Handle parameter validation, request processing, and response formatting for each operation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each sound operation with valid and invalid parameters to verify correct behavior

tasks.title: Implement Speech Operations
tasks.description: Develop functionality for speech-related API endpoints
tasks.details: Implement GET /speeches/{speech} and POST /text-to-speech. Validate required parameters like vendorId, handle request processing, and format responses appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each speech operation with valid and invalid parameters to verify correct behavior

tasks.title: Implement Transcription Operations
tasks.description: Develop functionality for transcription-related API endpoints
tasks.details: Create functions for GET /transcripts/{transcript} and POST /create-transcript. Validate language codes, handle request processing, and format responses correctly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each transcription operation with valid and invalid parameters to verify correct behavior

tasks.title: Implement Subtitle File Operations
tasks.description: Develop functionality for subtitle file-related API endpoints
tasks.details: Implement GET /subtitleFiles/{subtitle} and POST /generate-subtitle-file. Validate parameters like type and style, handle request processing, and format responses appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each subtitle file operation with valid and invalid parameters to verify correct behavior

tasks.title: Implement Video Operations
tasks.description: Develop functionality for video-related API endpoints
tasks.details: Create functions for GET /videos/{video} and implement video editing operations like add audio, add subtitles, generate AI videos, and other transformations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each video operation with valid and invalid parameters to verify correct behavior

tasks.title: Implement Dynamic Field Rendering
tasks.description: Create UI components to display operation-specific fields
tasks.details: Develop dynamic form rendering logic that shows fields based on selected operation. Implement validation for required parameters and format input correctly.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify field visibility and validation for each operation type

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Logging
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling and logging mechanisms
tasks.details: Create error handling for all API operations, including validation errors, network issues, and unexpected exceptions. Implement logging for debugging and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test error scenarios and verify proper error messages and logging

tasks.title: Integrate with n8n Credential System
tasks.description: Securely store and retrieve API credentials
tasks.details: Implement credential storage using n8n's credential system. Create UI for entering API key and handle secure retrieval during API requests.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify credential storage and retrieval works correctly with valid API keys
